WHAT IS

What is NoHoomans Pub ?

The Pub on an old rusty space station - first special module of the upcoming game that will provide limited access exclusively for Holders of our NFT collection.

The Pub will serve as a Social Hub, where players interact with each other via voice/text chat, spend time watching movies, singing karaoke, and playing different mini-games such as pool, poker, blackjack, darts, arcades, and more.

COLLECTIONS

PFP COLLECTION

Aliens NFT Collection - the first collection that will be integrated as full-body 3D Characters into the upcoming P2E MMORPG (CRYPTED SPACE).

Owner's privileges:

- Private access to NoHoomans Pub;

- Generate passive income through staking (when $CRYPTED introduced);

- Receive shares from future sales of property and in-game items in the main game (when Spaceships and Quarters introduced).

COLLECTIONS

ROADMAP

Our first limited collection of 5555 Aliens with unique traits and rarity that will be used as in-game playable characters.

Grand opening of NoHoomans Pub demo version of the game, where everyone will be able to explore the early stages of the main game development. Applicable only for PC users.

Holders will earn $CRYPTED token by staking our NFT collection. This token will serve as the main currency for the in-game Tokenomics.

Ship module and hangars will be implemented to serve as an example of basic mechanics and controls.

In-game multiplayer system will be launched. Players will get the opportunity to interact using integrated methods of communication and entertainment inside the demo version.

Introduction of the P2E MMORPG (early stage). This is when the team will start focusing heavily on the development of the main game.

This period implies the full preparation including the added modules and game mechanics to operate at its full potential.

All the basic game mechanics will be ready to provide full Plug & Play experience.

NPCs, Quests, New Ships, Star-Systems, Planets, Stations, and other in-game items will be added.

"Roadmap Phase 2" will be introduced for CRYPTED SPACE.

On a small station somewhere among the remnants of planet Earth, a cozy little pub awaits its alien guests. Only one rule - No Hoomans Allowed!
